job.title: Software Engineer II
job.description: Are you looking for an opportunity to challenge yourselfbrbrAt ZoomInfo our employees work hard to define new possibilities and they are driven by winning ZoomInfo is a company that got to where it is today on the backs of heroic efforts over the years by our employees and we are looking for more people to contribute to those efforts Youll see that collaboration is second nature youll be greeted by a team of incredibly smart talented and motivated individuals who will help you define your new best and most of all youll have funbrbrYoull be presented with opportunities to both personally and professionally develop as you build your career We believe that our employees love to work and love to work here and that you will like coming to work because of the sense of accomplishment you get from being a part of what were buildingbrbrYou are a fit for our team if you refuse to lose you seek challenges and you love to win We welcome you to join our team of difference makers who are people working with a passion to win together The mission of the Web Applications Team is to build attractive and easytouse tools which provide our clients with access to indepth profiles of millions of business people and companiesbrbrAs a strongSoftware Engineer on the Engage Teamstrong you will get to explore and work with cuttingedge technologies and a tremendously large and fantastically rich data set If you like working on tough problems whether thats building systems that handle millions of customer requests per day or how to make sense of over a billion pieces of potentially correlated data ZoomInfo could be the right place for youbrbrstronguThe Opportunitybrustrongul liWork with cloud technologies like Kubernetes DynamoDB CloudSearch etcli liDriven to learn investigate and use new technology as you push your knowledge and our technology to new levelsli liWork in fast paced and highly dynamic environment to solve challenging problems along a great team of engineersli liWrite highvolume server applications full stackli liWork for a profitable growing company that works with an impressive Fortune 500 client listli brbrulstronguThe Requirementsbrustrongul li2 years industry experience BS in Computer Science or equivalentli liExperience in Java or Cli liExperience using cloud platforms like AWS or Google Cloud Platformli liExperience using Angular or React and Nodejsli liFamiliarity with SolrLuceneElastic search  is a plusli liPassionate about using technology to solve interesting challengesli liExcited to tell us why you want to work here and what kinds of challenges youre looking forliul
